account_activated.subject: Your Account Has Been Activated
account_activated.line: We are excited to let you know that your account has been successfully activated.
account_activated.thank_you: Thank you for being a part of our community!

account_deactivated.subject: Your Account Has Been Deactivated
account_deactivated.line: We regret to inform you that your account has been deactivated. If you think this is a mistake, please contact support.
account_deactivated.thank_you: We hope to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

account_registered.subject: Your Account Verification Process
account_registered.line1: Please click the link button below to verify your email address.
account_registered.line2: If you did not create an account, please disregard this process.

account_reset.subject: Your Account Reset Password Process
account_reset.line1: Please click the link button below to reset your password.
account_reset.line2: If you did not reset password, please disregard this process.
